dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: This is Faust, a pleasure to meet you.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: I’d gained a habit of carefully observing my surroundings. I’ve got your current destination down, too.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: It’s beneficial to allocate a time of the day when all of us can relax. Mental health management can be surprisingly difficult.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: I’m used to darkness. One time, I stayed alone in a cramped room with no power for 59 days.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: My old workplace was underground. A cold artificial light was all we had.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: While I strive to comprehend most laws and denizens of the world… Some things are simply not meant to be understood.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: …My old job had a manager, too. Though I never had a chance to talk with them directly like I do now. This is new to me… but it isn’t bad.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: I often had to clean up the bodies of coworkers with whom I had dined the day before. Here… I don’t experience such things, at least. Yes, I’d say it’s not too bad here.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: Intolerable pain, unknowable monsters, dying colleagues… Those aren’t what I fear. Rather, it’s…

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: A sudden disappearance, often seen.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: I suppose I’ll put forth some effort one more time.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: I’m ready.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Hopefully this goes well.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: What was done wrong?

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: There’s no fear right now.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: You’re up next.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Ah!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: That wasn’t scary.

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: It’s good to have had you, at least.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Preparation makes things easy.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: I’m all too used to this.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: This is far from the hardest battle I’ve fought.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Faust has always been competent.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: It’s fortunate that we have another chance.
